name: My Little Investigations
storyline: Rarity's prized jewels: The True Blue (a gorgeous blue shining gemstone) along with Opal (her cat) and it's up to the element of magic: Twilight Sparkle to find the culprits before the incompetent investigation team from Canterlot convicts one of the CMC as the thief and takes her away.
summary:
A fangame of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic, Inspired by Ace Attorney Investigations, created by GabuEx and ZeusAssassin published on the Equestrian Dreamers website. Unfortunately, Case 2 was canceled.

The story takes place in Ponyville, after season 2 and before than 3, and tells how Rarity is the victim of the theft of a great sapphire and his cat ,Opal, all indicating Scootaloo as the culprit. But Twilight Sparkle decides to investigate thoroughly to uncover the real culprit.
